trans-unit.source: [+1]: Target player discards a card. [−2]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. [−8]: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

[+1]: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [+1]: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control. [−7]: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
